attributes.action: stop food companies from adding harmful additives to our food
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are demanding that that all additives known to cause hyper activity in children, anemia, asthma, high blood pressure,and all other known imbalances in the human body including cancer and all other known incurable diseases, be removed from all food and drinks products.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
